General.Name: Westwing Comércio Varejista S.A
General.Description: Westwing Comércio Varejista S.A. engages in the e-commerce business in Brazil and internationally. The company sells furniture, decoration items, clothing, accessories, lighting, kitchen, and pet products through its website and platforms for mobile applications. It also operates 4 physical stores. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil. Westwing Comércio Varejista S.A. is a subsidiary of Kedar Empreendimentos e Participacoes S.A.
General.Address: Avenida Queiroz Filho, São Paulo, SP, Brazil
